articles.title: Light rain brings hope for fire-ravaged Argentina province
articles.description: They bring it in a trailer, they are getting everything possible so that we can focus on the fire and try to help, she said.The light rainfall cheered the firefighters.Its a blessing from God, I think God took pity on us, said another volunteer, Estefana Riveiro, who is carrying buckets of water to help our animals.
articles.content:
Wildfires that have been ravaging northern Argentina for several weeks advanced relentlessly Sunday, although the light rains that began over the weekend gave some hope to firefighters.

articles.title: Light rain brings hope for fire-ravaged Argentina province
articles.description: Wildfires that have been ravaging northern Argentina for several weeks continue to advance relentlessly, though there are hopes the light rains that began over the weekend will help authorities curb the blazes.
articles.content:
Cows gather next to a column of fire in Santo Tome, Corrientes province, Argentina, Sunday, Feb. 20, 2022. Fires continue to ravage the Corrientes province that has burnt over half-a-million hectares. (AP Photo/Rodrigo Abd)

articles.title: Newly Discovered Dinosaur From Argentina Belongs to a Rather 'Armless' Family
articles.description: Paleontologists in Argentina have identified a new species of dinosaur which likely had such feeble forearms, it would make Tyrannosaurus rex look like Popeye in comparison.
articles.content:
Paleontologists in Argentina have identified a new species of dinosaur which likely had such feeble forearms, it would make Tyrannosaurus rex look like Popeye in comparison.

articles.title: A Legacy of Caste in Latin America
articles.description: Underlying the framework of today’s modern racial terminologies and racial thought, in places like Mexico, Cuba, Peru, Argentina and Brazil, is an architecture created by caste.
articles.content:
The author of the article is Ben Vinson III
There are few places you can go in the world that have not been touched directly, or indirectly, by caste. After spending my entire adult life studying the history of race and caste in Latin America, I’m co... [8322 chars]

articles.title: Sergio Aguero announces 'I'm going to the World Cup' as Man City legend eyes coaching role with Argentina
articles.description: After being forced into an early retirement due to heart issues, Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero has announced ‘I’m going to the World Cup’
articles.content:
After being forced into an early retirement due to heart issues, Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero has announced ‘I’m going to the World Cup’ as he eyes a coaching role with Argentina.

articles.description: Four-time NBA champion Manu Ginobili of the San Antonio Spurs also led Argentina to an Olympic gold in 2004
articles.content:
